trading-strategies.description: Trading strategies MCP server with multiple strategy implementations

strategies.name: mean_reversion
strategies.description: Mean reversion strategy that trades when prices deviate from their historical mean

lookback_period.description: Number of periods for calculating mean and standard deviation

entry_threshold.description: Number of standard deviations from mean to trigger entry

exit_threshold.description: Number of standard deviations from mean to trigger exit

strategies.name: moving_average_crossover
strategies.description: Moving average crossover strategy that generates signals when short MA crosses long MA

strategies.name: momentum_price_vol
strategies.description: Momentum breakout strategy based on price momentum and volume surge analysis

price_lookback.description: Lookback period for calculating price momentum

volume_lookback.description: Lookback period for calculating average volume

price_threshold.description: Minimum percentage price change to trigger momentum signal

volume_threshold.description: Volume multiplier to identify volume surge (e.g., 1.5 = 150% of average)
